edge: The team of researchers is set for an expedition to search for the Blood Orchid, which they believe will bring humans to a longer and healthier life. The film 'Anacondas' follows this team as they become stalked and hunted by giant anacondas while on their mission.

node_1: southeast asian tropical island of borneo
edge: The team of researchers travels to the Southeast Asian tropical island of Borneo to search for the Blood Orchid. While on their mission, they are hunted by the deadly giant anacondas that inhabit the island.
Gordon Mitchell and Dr. Jack Byron are both members of the team of researchers funded by New York pharmaceutical firm Wexel Hall who travel to Borneo to search for the Blood Orchid.
Dr. Jack Byron convinces Captain Bill Johnson and his partner Tran Wu to take an unsafe path despite their misgivings while the team is on their mission in Borneo.
Sam Rogers and Gail Stern are both members of the team of researchers funded by New York pharmaceutical firm Wexel Hall who travel to Borneo to search for the Blood Orchid.
Gordon Mitchell and Dr. Ben Douglas are both members of the team of researchers funded by New York pharmaceutical firm Wexel Hall who travel to Borneo to search for the Blood Orchid.
Dr. Jack Byron and the team of researchers funded by New York pharmaceutical firm Wexel Hall believe that the Blood Orchid contains a fountain of youth.
Captain Bill Johnson and his partner Tran Wu are both guides who accompany the team of researchers funded by New York pharmaceutical firm Wexel Hall to Borneo.
Gail Stern falls into the water while on their mission in Borneo and is attacked by a crocodile before being rescued by Captain Bill Johnson.
